# GitHub Repository Topics

Recommended topics for the YanYuCloudCube/Family-π³ repository.

## Core Topics
- ai
- artificial-intelligence
- chatbot
- devops
- typescript
- react

## Architecture & Design
- cyberpunk
- multi-agent
- mcp
- model-context-protocol
- websocket
- real-time

## Development & Tools
- ci-cd
- automation
- open-source
- family-ai
- vite
- tailwindcss

## Features
- llm
- large-language-models
- openai
- anthropic
- deepseek
- ollama

## Deployment
- docker
- kubernetes
- github-actions
- github-pages

## Usage
- developer-tools
- productivity
- collaboration
- intelligent-assistant

## How to Add Topics to GitHub

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the "Settings" tab
3. Scroll down to the "Topics" section
4. Click "Add topic"
5. Add the topics listed above

Alternatively, you can use the GitHub CLI:

```bash
gh repo edit YanYuCloudCube/Family-π³ --add-topic ai,artificial-intelligence,chatbot,devops,typescript,react,cyberpunk,multi-agent,mcp,model-context-protocol,websocket,real-time,ci-cd,automation,open-source,family-ai,vite,tailwindcss,llm,large-language-models,openai,anthropic,deepseek,ollama,docker,kubernetes,github-actions,github-pages,developer-tools,productivity,collaboration,intelligent-assistant
```
